lom:description.lom:string:
BEST sought to convene the nations respected practitioners, researchers and policymakers and identify whats working across the country to develop the technical talent of under-represented groups in pre-K through 12, higher education, and the workplace. No comprehensive assessment on this scale had ever been attempted. Three blue ribbon panels published their reports in 2004:
What it Takes: Pre-K-12 Design Principles to Broaden Participation in Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics - Part 1 - Part 2

lom:title.lom:string: BEST Report-"Pre-K-12 Design Principles to Broaden Participation in Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics"
